pylayers.signal.bsignal.FUsignal.window¶

FUsignal.window(win='hamming')[source]¶

windowing of FU signal

hamming blackman hanning
>>> x = np.arange(2,8,0.1)
>>> y = np.ones(len(x))
>>> U = FUsignal(x,y)
>>> fi = plt.figure()
>>> U.plot()
>>> U.window('hamming')
>>> U.plot()
